io.spine.server.bus

Interface MessageDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the type of class of the dispatched messages
    E - the type of the message envelopes
    R - the type of the result of the dispatching function. For unicast dispatching is the type of the IDs of entity that receives a dispatched message. For multicast dispatching is the type of the set of entity IDs.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommandDispatcher<I>, EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalMessageDispatcher<I>, MulticastDispatcher<C,E,I>, UnicastDispatcher<C,E,I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommandDispatcher, AbstractCommander, AbstractCommandHandler, AbstractEventSubscriber, AggregatePartRepository, AggregateRepository, EventDispatchingRepository, EventDispatchingRepository.AbstractExternalEventDispatcher, ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository

    public interface MessageDispatcher<C extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,E extends io.spine.core.MessageEnvelope,R>
    A dispatcher of a message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean canDispatch(E envelope)
      Checks if this dispatcher can dispatch the given message.
      R dispatch(E envelope)
      Dispatches the message contained in the passed envelope.
      java.util.Set<C> getMessageClasses()
      Obtains a set of message classes that can be processed by this dispatcher.
      void onError(E envelope, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Handles an error occurred during dispatching a message.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageClasses

        java.util.Set<C> getMessageClasses()
        Obtains a set of message classes that can be processed by this dispatcher.
        Returns:
        non-empty set of message classes

      • dispatch

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
R dispatch(E envelope)
        Dispatches the message contained in the passed envelope.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope with the message
        Returns:
        ID(s) of entities to which the message was dispatched

      • onError

        void onError(E envelope,
             java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Handles an error occurred during dispatching a message.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the message which caused the error
        exception - the error

      • canDispatch

        default boolean canDispatch(E envelope)
        Checks if this dispatcher can dispatch the given message.

        This method does not check that the type of the message is one of the dispatched message classes. Instead, it validates the message upon some custom rules of this dispatcher.

        Extend this method to forbid messages from being dispatched to this instance.

        Parameters:
        envelope - the message to check
        Returns:
        true is the given message can be dispatched by this dispatcher, false otherwise
